attributes.action: Stop Network Rail erecting GSM - R Masts
attributes.additional_details:
To prevent network rail erecting communication masts of up to 90ft high when ever and where ever they like. This is being done without planning permission, without consultation and with no consideration for communities.
These masts represent a possible health danger to our children and future generations, they will also affect house prices and drive people away from what could already be failing communities.This government wants to be open - well let it be open and stop this project.
